value.name: Girlfriend called cops on child molester who'd been on the run for two years then died in West Village gun battle
value.description: Charles Mozdir, 32, had been accused of molesting two young boys in California in 2012 His girlfriend was the one who tipped off police after she saw his case on Sunday night's episode of CNN's ...
